title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Nov 24 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Nov 24 2021
description:
The left's shock troops, BLM, say they will protest the Arbery trial if the verdicts don't go their way. Clay says black lives only matter when it is an alleged white perpetrator. Supply chain be damned: Biden will require truck drivers get vaccinated to cross border. Buck thinks there will be pushback with ramifications. Media begins to memory hole the Waukesha parade attack. Jen Psaki dodges question about Biden apologizing to Kyle Rittenhouse for calling him a white supremacist. Even with vaccinations, more people died of covid in 2021 than 2020. We are still on defense against the woke mob. Energy Secretary Granholm has no idea how to do her job: Couldn't answer basic U.S. oil consumption question.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
